sentences.english: Before athletics, you need to undresses, relieve the feces and urine, and drink a cup of warm boiling water.
sentences.chinese: 运动前宽衣解带，解除大小便，最好喝杯温开水。

sentences.english: Can undressing a stranger lead to love?
sentences.chinese: 给陌生人宽衣解带可以带来爱情吗？

definition: please take off your coat (honorific)/loose-fitting garment
not wearing one thread (idiom); absolutely naked/without a stitch of clothing/in one's birthday suit
to strip naked/to strip nude/(coll.) to find oneself a partner
to take off (trousers)/to drop one's pants
to raise and lower one's hand (idiom); to signal as conspiratorial hint/fig. conspiring to defraud
to become naked/to undress/to expose (one's body)
half willing and half unwilling (idiom); to yield after making a show of resistance
taking a bath together as a couple
the pleasure of close intimacy in a couple (idiom)/sexual intercourse
